iati-activity.title: Frame agreement with NGO (SASK)
iati-activity.description: The project strives to ensure respect for labour rights and decent working conditions in the entire production chain, and proper working conditions which are negotiated within a contractual framework.

iati-activity.title: Frame agreement with NGO (SASK)
iati-activity.description: The main project objectives are: to strengthen the STTR union and to promote the participation of rural population on establishing the land ownership for aproximately 30,000 inhabitants.

iati-activity.title: Frame agreement with NGO (SASK)
iati-activity.description: The aim of the project is to organize and develop strong trade unions for the building sector (in both, the formal and the informal sectors).

iati-activity.title: Frame agreement with NGO (SASK)
iati-activity.description: The goal of the project is to strengthen the ability of trade unions within the selected multinational companies to enter into social dialogue with the management and create a communication channel to allow the trade union and the company management to hold discussions.

iati-activity.title: Frame agreement with NGO (SASK)
iati-activity.description: The aim of the project is to strengthen the organizational capacity of ICEM affiliated trade unions in Brazil.

iati-activity.title: Frame agreement with NGO (SASK)
iati-activity.description: The aim of the project is to reduce occupational accidents and disease among workers in the poultry industry. This will be done by improving working conditions and increasing awareness and education among factory workers and, particularly, union activists.

location.name: Brazil, Peru, Chile, Colombia, Paraguay, CAN - Andean Community

iati-activity.title: Frame agreement with NGO (SASK)
iati-activity.description: The project's long-term objective is to achieve a situation in which public sector employeesâ rights have been written into the Constitution. The goal of the project is to strengthen the ability of health sector unions to negotiate contracts; cooperation between labour market parties has increased and the organisational structures of unions has changed to meet structural changes in public sector administration.

iati-activity.title: Frame agreement with NGO (SASK)
iati-activity.description: The aim of the project is to improve the youth's position and participation in public sector unions.

iati-activity.title: Frame agreement with NGO (SASK)
iati-activity.description: The project covers countries on two different continents, Brazil and South Africa. Despite the geographical distance, the unions have much in common as the circumstances of and challenges facing freelance workers are much the same regardless of where they work. The unions are to some extent in the middle of different kinds of development stages, which means they can gain a lot from communicating with each other either during the project period or afterwards. The project's main focus on increased organisation and looking after the workersâ interests, and the benefits of this will become clear both during and after the project period.

iati-activity.title: Promotion of Youth Employment and Sustainable Development
iati-activity.description: This project aims at improving the possibilities of disadvantaged youth in the area of SimÃµes Filho through vocational training in ICT, environmental issues and training in life skills. The duration is 8 months, which entails enhancement of technical skills as well as personal development and internships and seminars. Thereafter the youth will be inserted into the job market in cooperation with public and private sector (employment offices, businesses, NGOs). The strategy of the project is to promote an alliance with public, private and third sector in order to tackle the youth unemployment in Brazil.
